!define slimSymbol {chromeOpts}

!4 1. Check if Context Help is visible
!|script         |browser test                   |
|Go to the Google Test                           |
|wait for visible|Context help                   |
|ensure          |is visible on page|Context help|

!4 2. Check if context helper contains data
!|script         |browser test                    |
|Go to the Google Test                            |
|wait for visible|Context help                    |
|ensure          |is visible on page|Context help |
|click           |Context help                    |
|wait            |2                 |seconds      |
|#Check if the three categories are visible       |
|ensure          |is visible on page|Scenario's   |
|ensure          |is visible on page|Fixtures     |
|ensure          |is visible on page|Slim symbols |
|#Check if slim symbol is present and visible     |
|click           |Slim symbols                    |
|ensure          |is visible on page|${slimSymbol}|
|click           |chromeOpts                      |
|ensure          |is visible on page|copy map     |
